title: What Garen looks like under his armor

replies.body: As a Garen main, this will corrupt my mind forever until Riot releases Pool Party Garen and confirms that he in fact is a normal sized buff dude wearing armor.
As a Garen main I'm ashamed I forgot all about this skin lol.

Also you forgot this guy:

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TzTEAgvGi_Q/V3VjW5Iz5QI/AAAAAAAARKI/SyQgvTWncIoPSXI20UHbckxAqOZuIe2DACLcB/s1600/Fiora_Splash_5.jpg

But thats excusable, its hard not to stare

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kL8vZAuR,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2016-08-12T21:54:19.889+0000)
>
> Also you forgot this guy:
> 
> https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-TzTEAgvGi_Q/V3VjW5Iz5QI/AAAAAAAARKI/SyQgvTWncIoPSXI20UHbckxAqOZuIe2DACLcB/s1600/Fiora_Splash_5.jpg
> 
> But thats excusable, its hard not to stare

I want that Garen skin because he is too f##cking adorable.
how dare thee not see the hotness that is {{champion:122}} and {{champion:23}} in this splash

> [{quoted}](name=GilgameshSol,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kL8vZAuR,comment-id=000200000000000100000001,timestamp=2016-08-13T00:31:02.726+0000)
>
> how dare thee not see the hotness that is {{champion:122}} and {{champion:23}} in this splash

I've seen them. I'd actually buy Tryndamere I'd he was as hot as that splash.
we need garen with floaties rito pls

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kL8vZAuR,comment-id=000200000000000100000000,timestamp=2016-08-12T22:45:27.944+0000)
>
> we need garen with floaties rito pls

Well, we begged and begged and begged for Pool Party Taric, and got him post rework. Maybe it's time to beg for Floaties Garen.
I'd be down for that so long as we get a PP Sona where her Etwahl is a tiki bar.

Yeah, I admit to not noticing him at first XD

The scarf gives it away.
As a Garen main you should be ashamed. Period.
Hey hey easy dude, I also main J4 top.
So it's more about your love of Demacia than anything? I'll let it slide.
And ~~Noxians~~ detractors thought he was just a boring Demacian who spun around.
